item.title: vim tips
item.description: Here I will place some vim tips to not to forget. Command promt <ctrl+r>" to paste yanked text to vim command prompt, link <ctl-r><ctl-w> to paste word under cursor to vim command prompt, link History q: to open vim history, it is possible to edit and search there like in normal mode, link Editing <ctrl+v> + <any_key> will insert “value” of a key, nice to have when editing vim config file Folding za toggle fold under cursor zm increase fold level zo open fold, zO for open all levels move cursor to bracket then press zf% to fold everything inside link

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I am pronvis, a backend developer, adrenalin lover and musician. I worked primarily with distributed systems. Prefered languages: scala, rust.

item.title: Sum and Product Puzzle solution
item.description: This is a translation of my article in a russian IT site Puzzle Solution Puzzle Two integers, A and B, each between 2 and 100 inclusive, have been chosen. The product, AÃ—B, is given to mathematician Dr. P. The sum, A+B, is given to mathematician Dr. S. They each know the range of numbers. Their conversation is as follows: P: "I don't have the foggiest idea what your sum is, S.
